dcterms:creator: Y. Meng
Y. Sun
W.-S. Chang
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of geometric information extracted from the Center Pompidou-Metz Model, which features a weave pattern constructed from glue-laminated timber, serving as a case study for training machine learning models to predict free-form structures.
dcterms:title: Center Pompidou-Metz Model

dcterms:creator: Y. Meng
Y. Sun
W.-S. Chang
dcterms:description: This dataset includes real free-form grid structures used as learning input for machine learning models to predict new curves based on the range of achievable shapes.
dcterms:title: Free-form grid structures (used as learning input)
